title: Edge Lux Shoes
subtitle: Women's Training
description:
Comfortable running shoes make all the difference. That's where these adidas shoes come in. Designed specifically for and by women, they combine flex zone areas under the forefoot and energy-returning Bounce cushioning for a springy step. Structured to adapt to the shape of the foot, they look stylish and keep you streamlined too. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Iron Metallic

title: Retropy Adisuper Her Vegan Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description:
You like your shoes like you like your fruit juice. Healthy. That's why these adidas shoes are made with vegan and recycled materials — a better choice for the planet. And as a healthy treat for you, they celebrate plant-based lifestyles and tasty fruit juice with vivid colors, a lace jewel and graphics on the sockliner. A message on the tongue reminds you to "make it juicy."

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.

title: Adilette Comfort Slides
subtitle: Women's Yoga
description: Whether you're heading home from the gym or hanging on the couch with friends, these slides keep your feet wrapped in lightweight comfort. Pair them with socks and shorts for your post-workout look or with your favorite swimwear for the ultimate beach vibe. The adidas 3-Stripes design completes your sport style.
colors: Signal Orange / Signal Orange / Vivid Berry

title: Gamemode Turf Soccer Shoes
subtitle: Soccer
description: Make your choice. Find your voice. With two styles and a range of designs, adidas Gamemode is serious about self-expression. Created with a comfortable fit for a wide range of foot shapes, these soccer shoes offer a cushioned touch thanks to their soft HybridTouch upper. Underneath, a lug rubber outsole helps you express yourself on artificial turf. The graphics take their eye-catching inspiration from LEGO® bricks.
colors: Cloud White / Carbon / Bright Blue

title: Web Boost Día de los Muertos Shoes
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Honor the past while running towards the future. The colorful graphics on these everyday running shoes celebrate Día de los Muertos, when we remember loved ones who are no longer physically with us. Webbing on the tongue offers space to write the name of someone you want to think of as you move through your day. Energy-returning BOOST cushioning delivers all-day comfort, and adidas PRIMEKNIT provides a snug fit that flexes and supports you through every step.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

title: Ultraboost 5.0 DNA Shoes
subtitle: Youth Sportswear
description:
Any time you're on your feet is a good time to wear the adidas Ultraboost. These juniors' shoes pack all the performance techs that runners love into a design you'll want to wear outside of gym class. Beyond looks, its superpower is comfort – from the soft feel of the adidas PRIMEKNIT upper to the incredible energy return of BOOST.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Pink

title: Geodiver Primeblue Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Style or planet? No need to pick sides. Lace into the streamlined design of these sporty shoes and join in adidas' commitment to help end plastic waste. Their minimalist upper is made with recycled materials and a partially recycled EVA midsole that keeps you walking on clouds. Sometimes, less is more.

This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

title: Nizza Platform Mid Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description: The adidas Nizza sneaker has been loved by B-ballers, skaters and trendsetters for decades. Now, we can add ocean activists to that list, with this revamp of the iconic style using innovations to help end plastic waste. The '70s vibes still come through strong — shoutout to the sun-bleached color effect — but these shoes are looking to the future.
colors: Almost Blue / Pantone / Wonder White

description:
Slow them down? Not a chance. Set them up to explore in comfort in these kids' adidas shoes. Rooted in running but designed for all-day play, they keep feet comfortable with a supportive knit mesh upper and a cushioned EVA midsole. Oh, and they look good too. Win win. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Grey Five / Cloud White

description:
Even kids who love lie-ins will be out the door quickly in these adidas trainers. They're super easy to slip on, and they feature a knit textile upper that feels light and comfy. Made with an EVA outsole that is softer and more flexible than rubber, and with Cloudfoam cushioning that supports their feet, these shoes are perfect for running and relaxing too.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Grey Five / Grey Three / Carbon

description: When you're out in the city, it's easy to get lost in the sea of people. Set yourself apart from the crowd with these adidas OZELIA shoes. They're based on '90s runners and then transformed to look like the future with fluid, futuristic weldings. And when your days move fast, plush Adiprene cushioning helps you keep the pace.
colors: Core Black / Collegiate Gold / Pulse Blue

description: Why should runners get all the best shoes? These adidas running shoes work as well as an everyday pair as they do for short-distance jogs. They have all the techs that athletes love, like the incredible energy return of BOOST. The "1.0" in the name refers to the iteration of adidas PRIMEKNIT – it's the same pattern we used on the original Ultraboost from 2015.
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

description: We went all out with the comfort for these adidas Retropy F90 shoes. That's in large part to the super-soft EVA midsole, plus let's not forget the Torsion System for stability. Both come together to set you up to feel good day in and day out. A trifecta of nubuck, suede and mesh take over the upper — giving a nod to their vintage roots.
colors: Almost Blue / Crystal White / Bliss Orange

description: Fusing technology and style, these adidas sneakers are an update on the ever-popular Galaxy 5 design. The lightweight textile upper keeps air flowing. The Cloudfoam midsole cushions your feet, and the rubber outsole is strong and grippy on all types of surfaces. So whether you wear them for workouts or for the weekend, they'll feel sturdy and comfortable.

An everyday go-to with subtle sport styling, the Swift Run is made for the daily grind. It draws on heritage adidas running styles and gives them a new spin. These shoes feature a stretchy, sock-like knit upper for a close fit and supportive comfort. Floating 3-Stripes and embroidered lines on the forefoot make a subtle style statement.
colors: Raw White / Core Black / Carbon

description:
For the kids who always seem to move at top speed and never run out of fuel. These adidas running-inspired shoes match them step for step. The breathable upper keeps little feet cool and comfortable. Lightweight midsole cushioning absorbs impact with every jump and stride.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

The Adilette has been a favorite of beachgoers and poolside loungers since 1972. An embossed adidas Badge of Sport print on the soft bandage upper gives this version of the iconic slides a sporty feel. The contoured footbed delivers the stability the slides are famous for.
colors: Core Black / Core White / Grey Six

description: Casual style just got easier. Lace up in these juniors' adidas Multix Shoes and bring a sleek running-inspired edge to your everyday look. A sporty mixed material upper and EVA midsole keep your feet comfy as you take on whatever the day holds.

Friends are stronger together. That's why these kids' adidas shoes celebrate Disney buddies Minnie Mouse and Daisy Duck. The colorful sneakers are also easy for kids to find in the shoe rack. They have a hook-and-look strap for easy tightening.  

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Scaled for juniors, these adilette sandals evoke sunny afternoons by the pool. At once simple and fashion-forward, the slides stylishly segue from poolside to a warm night out. The 3-Stripes upper looks as timeless now as when it debuted in '72. A contoured footbed keeps you comfy on the go.
colors: Legend Ink / Cloud White / Legend Ink

description: A modern take on an adidas classic. These slides keep your feet wrapped in comfort while adding a bold style statement to any outfit. Pair them with tights and a workout tank top, for a cozy fit on the way to the pool or yoga studio, or with your favorite denim and crop top for an athletic-casual vibe. A 3-Stripes graphic over the top strap keeps your look rooted in sport.
colors: Signal Orange / Signal Orange / Vivid Berry

description:
It's never too early for that first pair of Stan Smiths. These toddlers' adidas shoes are a sized-down version of the same sneakers beloved by supermodels, grandpas, and teenagers around the world. Simple straps make them easy to cinch on wiggly little feet.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

The Adilette debuted in 1970 as a shower slide for the German national football team during the world's biggest match in Mexico before being officially released back in '72. It's been a style mainstay of adidas ever since. These slides stay true to the original look with a contoured footbed and 3-Stripes across the bandage upper.
colors: Core Black / White / Core Black

description: Taking inspiration from the famed Racing 1 as a design base, the adidas Retropy F90 Shoes feature a modernized shape that still honors its retro roots. Nubuck, suede and mesh lend a vintage feel to the upper. The EVA midsole provides a comfortable everyday feeling.
colors: Almost Blue / Crystal White / Bliss Orange

description:
The city is alive. It's always changing, moving and humming with energy. So lace into your adidas NMD_R1 Shoes and jump right into the action. BOOST cushioning energizes your stride to keep you going when evening plans extend into all-night adventures. And that signature NMD style — shout out to the sleek upper and midsole plugs — means you're always in style. No matter where you are. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
colors: Bright Orange / Bright Orange / Core Black

description:
Take control when you step onto the court in these adidas basketball shoes. The mesh upper keeps your feet feeling fresh as you run baseline to baseline. Lightweight Lightmotion cushioning underfoot absorbs impact with every step. 

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.
colors: Vivid Red / Cloud White / Core Black

description: When the temperature's high, but your motivation's higher. Lace on these adidas Ultraboost running shoes and head to the shady side of the street. The blend of comfort, responsiveness and breathability will have you feeling good through warm-weather miles. HEAT.RDY keeps you cool, and BOOST returns energy with every stride. Just don't forget to drink water.
colors: Legacy Indigo / Pulse Mint / Purple Rush

description:
What's better than chocolate-dipped strawberries? Not much, except maybe these adidas Forum shoes. A celebration of perfect pairings, they bring chocolate- and strawberry-inspired colors to your shoes, plus a hidden message under the strap that reads "be the chocolate to my strawberry." Every time you lace into these luxurious leather shoes, you might just fall in love.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Shock Pink

description: For young B-ballers who love the sport, they can't get enough time on the court. From the school gym to the park to their own backyard hoop, kids can keep working on their game in all-day comfort with these adidas basketball shoes. They offer durable stability that lasts season after season.
colors: Core Black / Gold Metallic / Cloud White

description:
Who has time for lacing, anyway? Definitely not your style star. That's why these kids' shoes have a one-piece design that can be pulled onto feet fast, plus flexible EVA cushioning that keeps up with all their moves. Wherever they run off to, they'll be rocking iconic adidas style. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Muted shades come through in a big way with the latest Ultraboost 1.0 DNA Shoes. Already known for its legendary status, the classic shoe steps things up this season with a fresh colorway that's designed to go the distance. From laid-back strolls around the city to catch ups with friends, these stylish, hazel-hued sneakers easily transition with you throughout the day. The iconic BOOST midsole and adidas PRIMEKNIT upper ensure comfort with every step and provides flexible support while you set a new style PB.
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

description: Don't just compete. Dominate. The mesh upper and flexible Bounce midsole on these adidas Courtjam Control Tennis Shoes team up to keep you comfortable as you build pressure on your opponent. Underneath, a TPU midfoot shank and grippy Adiwear hard court outsole ensure you're stable through every slide and sidestep. On the medial side, a combination of hidden lacing and abrasion zones specifically configured for the women's game help these shoes tough out every challenge.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Silver Metallic

description:
Enjoy the comfort of adidas Ultraboost through every moment of your action-filled days. These running shoes have hundreds of BOOST capsules that are fused together for incredible energy return and reliable cushioning. The trail-ready shoes have leather-like overlays that support the foot and maximize durability. A toothy rubber outsole grips on rugged paths and slippery surfaces. Lace up for confidence, stride after stride.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Non Dyed / Non Dyed / Bright Red

description: In a constantly changing world, be part of the change for good. Join our mission to help end plastic waste by slipping on these adidas NMD_R1 shoes made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. All the signature staples of the NMDs are there — from the sock-like knit upper to the plush BOOST midsole and iconic heel plugs. You're not just doing good with these sneakers; you're feeling and looking good too.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

description:
The pinnacle expression of tactical tech, the adidas NMD_R1 V3 Shoes evolve the NMD legacy and play with transparency. Plush BOOST cushioning means that comfort isn't even a question, and that every step is meant to feel good. Metallic accents and monogrammed details bring in extra style.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Grey One / Off White / Halo Silver

description: An adidas classic, through the lens of Y-3. The famed Gazelle is reimagined wrapped in suede for a clean, premium look. Additional foxing tape circles the entire outsole, which slightly curves on the lateral side for a subtle, yet distinctive accent. Heavy tumbled leather on the outsole highlights Y-3's high attention to detail.
colors: Black / Black / Core White

description:
Let your little one slide into these toddlers' adidas shoes. No laces means less time tying their shoes. They're made with a breathable mesh upper that contours around their little feet and an elastic strap to add stability. A pull tab at the heel makes it easy to put them on or take them off. The Cloudfoam midsole is soft and cushy to keep them comfortable throughout the day. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Strike when your opponent least expects it. Drive to the rim, pull up from deep and leave defenders in your wake — just like James Harden. These adidas basketball shoes are made with BOOST for the energy return you need from the opening whistle to those grueling last seconds of overtime. Bands on the forefoot and heel give you a locked-down feel all game long.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Toddlers like to take the long route. When they stop to investigate, these infants' wide-fit shoes from adidas will help them keep their balance. They have a layered mesh upper for a breathable feel. A big hook-and-loop strap fastens in seconds, so you'll be out the door quickly. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
Throw it back to the '70s with these adidas Nizza Shoes. Classic 3-Stripes deliver all the charm of the original while a tie-dye print adds a colorful update to the canvas upper. The rubber toe and vulcanized outsole cradle your feet in comfort.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Cloud White

description: Elevate a casual look, quite literally, with these adidas shoes. Slightly pumped-up outsoles add a little height while the soft textile upper gives them a textured look that pairs well with jeans, skirts or sporty shorts. Cloudfoam cushioning keeps your feet comfortable when you're on the move.
colors: Cloud White / Semi Turbo / Pulse Amber

description:
Feel the love. A collaboration with graffiti icon André Saraiva, these adidas Nizza sneakers transform a classic look into a message of affection for the Earth. See the stick-figure Mr. A smiling off the side? That's exactly what he stands for.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
colors: Crew Red / Wonder White / Wonder White

description: From the pool deck to the shower to the couch, these slides are made for the work-hard-rest-hard lifestyle. The slip-on construction gives you a snug fit that's easy to kick on and off as needed. Lightweight cushioning keeps your feet cradled in all-day comfort. The adidas script logo adds an extra touch of class to the iconic Adilette look.
colors: Clear Pink / Clear Pink / Super Pop

description:
Better with every run. The adidas Supernova shoes are designed for the early days of running, when you build up ease and distance every time you head out the door. This version is created with running group Tinman Elite. It's made in part with recycled materials, with a soft synthetic upper on an energy-returning BOOST midsole.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Whether you're heading to the locker room after an intense gym session or at home recovering on the couch, these slides keep your feet wrapped in lightweight comfort. The adidas 3-Stripes design keeps your sports-inspired look on point, while the LEGO® logo and LEGO® blocks-inspired features help you stay in touch with your playful side.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content.
colors: Core Black / Core White / Grey Six

description: Born on the basketball court, the adidas Campus shoes have long been a favorite of subcultures around the world. From skaters to scenesters, they're an underground icon. This pair keeps with that tradition, putting the spotlight on Tokyo. Embroidered details honor traditional sashiko stitching. A premium mix of textile and leather looks just as luxe as it feels.
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Off White

description:
Take on the outdoors with ease. The adidas TERREX Free Hiker 2 GORE-TEX brings comfort and confidence to your everyday adventure. It's time to enjoy your outdoor experience. 

Take on the outdoors in style and comfort with the TERREX Free Hiker 2 GORE-TEX. Feel confident in most weather conditions thanks to the breathable GORE-TEX membrane and Continental™ rubber outsole. Enjoy your hikes with the updated design.
colors: Core Black / Grey Six / Grey Three

description: When running is your sport, there's nothing you love more than that daily run. Log miles in ultimate comfort when you lace up in these adidas shoes. A breathable upper keeps feet feeling cool and fresh on warm days. Lightweight cushioning makes each step more enjoyable.
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Beam Yellow
